add_contact_groups.description: Add the contact to a group
add_contact_groups.name: Add to Group

add_contact_urn.description: Add a URN for the contact
add_contact_urn.name: Add URN

open_ticket.description: Open a ticket with a human agent
open_ticket.name: Open Ticket

remove_contact_groups.description: Remove the contact from a group
remove_contact_groups.name: Remove from Group

say_msg.placeholder: Send a message to the contact

send_broadcast.name: Send Broadcast
send_broadcast.placeholder: Send a message to the contact

send_msg.name: Send Message
send_msg.placeholder: Send a message to the contact

set_run_result.description: Save a result for this flow
set_run_result.name: Save Flow Result

split_by_run_result.description: Split by a result in the flow
split_by_run_result.name: Split by Flow Result

start_session.description: Start somebody else in a flow
start_session.name: Start Somebody Else

wait_for_dial.description: Wait for forwarded call to someone else
wait_for_dial.name: Wait for Forwarded Call

wait_for_response.description: Wait for the contact to respond
wait_for_response.name: Wait for Response

asset_selector.placeholder: Select existing [[name]] or enter a new one
asset_selector.placeholder_plural: Select existing [[name]] or enter a new one

contact_statuses.archived: Archived - remove from groups, ignore forever
contact_statuses.blocked: Blocked - remove from groups, ignore forever
contact_statuses.stopped: Stopped - remove from groups, ignore until they message again

drag_helper: To connect nodes, <1>drag</1> from the red circle.
empty_flow_message: <0>Let's get started</0><1>We recommend starting your flow by sending a message. This message will be sent to anybody right after they join the flow. This is your chance to send a single message or ask them a question.</1>
enter_to_create_group: Enter a name to create a new group
enter_to_create_label: Enter the name of an existing label or create a new one

errors.group_not_found: Enter the name of an existing group
errors.http_header_missing_name: HTTP headers must have a name
errors.network: Hmm, we ran into a problem trying to save your changes. It could just be that your internet connection is not working well at the moment. Please wait a minute or so and try again.
errors.server: Hmm, we ran into a problem trying to save your changes. If this problem persists, take note of the change you are trying to make and contact support.

forms.add_groups_summary: Select the groups to add the contact to.
forms.add_labels_summary: Select the labels to apply to the incoming message.
forms.add_quick_reply: Add a new Quick Reply and press enter.
forms.add_urn_summary: Add a new URN to reach the contact such as a phone number.
forms.all_destinations_description: Send a message to all destinations known for this contact. If you aren't sure what this means, leave it unchecked.
forms.continue_when_no_response: Continue when there is no response
forms.delimit_result_description: Evaluate your rules against a delimited part of your result
forms.enter_flow_parameters_summary: <0>[[flow]]</0> expects the following parameters to be set by this flow. These can be set using a <4>Save Flow Result</4> action or directly below.
forms.enter_new_name: Enter a new name for the contact
forms.localize_rules: Sometimes languages need special rules to route things properly. If a translation is not provided, the original rule will be used.
forms.localized_quick_replies: Add a new [[language]] Quick Reply and press enter.
forms.name: Name
forms.play_audio_help_text: Enter a variable that contains a recording the contact has previously recorded. For example, @results.voicemail or @fields.short_bio.
forms.quick_replies_summary: Quick Replies are made into buttons for supported channels. For example, when asking a question, you might add a Quick Reply for "Yes" and one for "No".
forms.remove_from_all_summary: Remove the active contact from all groups they're a member of.
forms.remove_groups_placeholder: Enter the name of an existing group
forms.remove_groups_summary: Select the groups to remove the contact from.
forms.result_category_help: An optional category for your result. For age, the value might be 17, but the category might be 'Young Adult'
forms.result_name_help: By naming the result, you can reference it later using [[resultFormat]]
forms.result_value_help: The value to save for this result or empty to clears it. You can use expressions, for example: @(title(input))
forms.select_channel: Select the channel to use for this contact
forms.select_language: Select the language to use for this contact
forms.select_who_to_start: Select who should be started in the flow
forms.send_msg_facebook_topic_placeholder: Select a topic to use over Facebook
forms.send_msg_facebook_warning: Sending bulk messages over a Facebook channel requires that a topic be specified if the user has not sent a message in the last 24 hours. Setting a topic to use over Facebook is especially important for the first message in your flow.
forms.send_msg_summary: Add an attachment to each message. The attachment can be a file you upload or a dynamic URL using expressions and variables from your Flow.
forms.send_msg_summary_plural: Add an attachment to each message. The attachment can be a file you upload or a dynamic URL using expressions and variables from your Flow.
forms.split_by_channel_placeholder: Select the channels to split by
forms.split_by_groups: Select the groups you'd like to split by below
forms.split_by_scheme_summary: The contact's URN is the address they used to reach you such as their phone number or a Facebook ID. Select which URN types to split by below.
forms.subject: Subject
forms.type_label: When a contact arrives at this point in your flow...
forms.webhook_body_summary: Modify the body of the [[method]] request that will be sent to your webhook.
forms.webhook_example: This response would add <1>@webhook.product</1> and <4>@webhook["stock level"]</4> for use in the flow.
forms.webhook_header_summary: Add any additional headers below that you would like to send along with your request.
forms.webhook_help: If your server responds with JSON, each property will be added to the Flow.
forms.whatsapp_warning: Sending messages over a WhatsApp channel requires that a template be used if you have not received a message from a contact in the last 24 hours. Setting a template to use over WhatsApp is especially important for the first message in your flow.

operators.has_number_gte: has a number at or above
operators.has_number_lte: has a number at or below
